spaceIsEmpty: Create your first base to start

baseModal.duplicateRecordsTip: Your revision history and collaborators will not be duplicated.
baseModal.missTargetTip: Please select a space to duplicate the base.
baseModal.copying: Duplicating base, it may take a while...
baseModal.copyingTemplate: Creating base from template, it may take a while...
baseModal.howToCreate: How do you want to start?

spaceSetting.title: Settings
spaceSetting.generalDescription: Change the settings for your current space here
spaceSetting.collaboratorDescription: Manage collaborators of your space and set their access permission

pin.empty: Your pined bases and space will appear here

tooltip.noPermissionToCreateBase: You don't have permission to create base

tip.delete: Are you sure you want to delete <0/>?
tip.title: Tips
tip.exportTips1: Export the current base as a .tea file, which may take some time. You can check the export results in the notification center.
tip.exportTips2: You can import the .tea file in space -> more -> import
tip.exportTips3: Cross-base relation fields will be converted to single line text.
tip.exportIncludeDataDescription: Turn off to export only structure and configuration.

deleteSpaceModal.title: Delete space
deleteSpaceModal.blockedDesc: This space has an active subscription. Please cancel the subscription before deleting the space.
deleteSpaceModal.permanentDeleteWarning: This action will permanently delete all resources and data under the current space. Please proceed with caution!
deleteSpaceModal.confirmInputLabel: Please type DELETE to confirm the deletion

sharedBase.title: Shared with me
sharedBase.description: All the bases that invited me to join
sharedBase.empty: No bases shared with me yet

aiSetting.title: AI settings
aiSetting.description: Manage AI settings of your space
aiSetting.enableTips: Enable AI to use AI features in your space instead of using the system AI
aiSetting.enableSwitchTips: Please configure the large coding model before enabling

import.importWayTip: Click or drag and drop the file to upload in this area
import.baseImportTips: Click or drag and drop .tea file to upload in this area

template.title: Template
template.description: Create a new base from a template quickly
template.noTemplatesDescription: There is nothing here right now

noBases.title: Hi {{userName}}!
noBases.description: Let's start managing your work with your first base.

noSpaces.title: Hi {{userName}}!
noSpaces.description: Create your first space to start your data collaboration journey.

publishBase.title: Publish Base to community
publishBase.description: One-click publish base, inspiration is no longer lonely! Let more people see, use, and Remix your creativity, and build a more powerful business together
publishBase.previewTips: Let the world see your work
publishBase.unPublishConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to unpublish this base? It will no longer be visible in the community template center.

tips.atLeastOneNode: At least select one node to publish

publishBase.urlCopiedForDiscord: URL copied to clipboard! You can paste it in Discord.
publishBase.featuredTip: Officially featured. Your template will receive more exposure.
publishBase.unfeaturedTip: Not featured yet. Keep improving for a chance to be highlighted. Let more people see your work.
publishBase.publishSuccessDescription: Share your work to the world

unpublishedApps.title: Unpublished Apps Detected
unpublishedApps.description: Unpublished apps may cause template preview failures. Publish them now or continue anyway.
unpublishedApps.publishFailedTip1: Check if the source app can be published successfully
